text: Jaypee University is a private university located in Anoopshahr, Bulandshahr in Uttar Pradesh.It is part of the Jaypee Group.It has been established under UP act no 8 of 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Private universities in Uttar Pradesh Category:Bulandshahr district Category:Educational institutions established in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in India
title: Jaypee University, Anoopshahr
